title: AnyMem - Retain What You Learn, Apply What You Know
description: AnyMem: Your AI-powered learning companion. Make learning effortless and fun. Reinforce knowledge anytime, anywhere - on your phone or computer.

hero.title: Learn, Remember, Succeed
hero.description: AnyMem is your intelligent memory assistant, helping you retain knowledge effortlessly.

spacedRepetition.title: Smart Review
spacedRepetition.description: Leverage advanced spaced repetition algorithms to optimize your review schedule and master knowledge with ease.

multiPlatform.title: Cross-Platform Sync
multiPlatform.description: Seamlessly sync across web, iOS, and Android. Learn without boundaries.

customizableDecks.title: Custom Flashcard Decks
customizableDecks.description: Flexibly create and manage flashcard decks to build your personalized learning system.

download.title: AnyMem Mobile App
download.description: iOS and Android versions coming soon. Stay tuned!
